name: Ripple (itch) (Proton Fox)
description:
Ripple

The game requires you to escape from the facility using only your ears and impaired vision. Your lack of vision allows you to use a form of echolocation to see the world around you. Distract the robots tracking you using objects and attempt to escape.

Features
  • Full controller support for Xbox 360 and PS4 (Using DS4Windows).
  • Five levels to explore and escape from.
  • Additional difficulty option. Can you truly conquer the darkness?
  • Progression system that saves your progress.
Feedback

I hope that you enjoy playing through the game and look forward to hearing any feedback you have! 

Leave a comment below or send an email to protonfox@outlook.com.
